data.eml:eml: A new species of spider fly in the genus Sabroskya Schlinger from Malawi, with a key to Acrocerinae world genera (Diptera, Acroceridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Winterton, Shaun L., Gillung, Jessica P. (2012): A new species of spider fly in the genus Sabroskya Schlinger from Malawi, with a key to Acrocerinae world genera (Diptera, Acroceridae). ZooKeys 171: 1-15, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.171.2137, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.171.2137
